word:
Example set by Christ. 


     "In his earth life Christ was an example to all the human family, and he was obedient and helpful in the home. He learned the carpenter's trade, and worked with his own hands in the little shop at Nazareth. . . . . He was not willing to be defective even in the handling of tools. He was perfect as a workman as he was in character."--Sp. T. on Ed. pp. 37-39.
